p: Hydromethanol extracts of E. kebericho roots ceased motility of the trypanosomes within 40 min at 4 and 2 mg/mL concentration. At 0.5 mg/mL of the hydromethanol extract of E. kebericho roots, the motility was maintained for 80 min after which motility of the parasite is completely ceased. The motility of parasites ceased at 60 minutes for the E. kebericho roots extract at a dose of 1 mg/mL ( Table 1).
